descript.abstract: Superior Hiking Trail campsites and trailheads for completed trail throughout Cook, Lake, St. Louis and Carlton counties. These data were collected with high-quality, realtime differentially corrected GPS units by Sundew Technical Services. This project was funded in part under the Coastal Zone Management Act, by NOAA's Office of Ocean and Coastal Resource Management, in Conjunction with Minnesota's Lake Superior Coastal Program.
descript.purpose: This layer was created with the assistance of the DNR Division of Waters to support a variety of association management activities as well as other agency planning and management needs.
descript.supplinf: Minnesota's North Shore on Lake Superior.

timeperd.current: Data will be added as more segments of the trail are completed, and existing segments are altered.

place.placekey: Minnesota, Superior Hiking Trail, Lake Superior, Cook County, Lake County, St. Louis County, Carlton County, North Shore, Duluth, Two Harbors, Beaver Bay, Silver Bay, Schroeder, Tofte, Lutsen, Grand Marais, Hovland

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team

attracc.attraccr: Attributes were reviewed by trail association staff.

dataqual.complete: Data represents all existing SHTA facilities along the the trail.

horizpa.horizpar: Horizontal position accuracy is determined by the data collecting GPS unit, almost entirely Trimble Realtime or Post Differentially Corrected GPS Units. 1-3 meters on average.

procstep.procdesc: These data were collected with high quality, realtime differentially corrected GPS units by Sundew Technical Services.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table. Field names refer to the actual names of fields in the table; displayed field names (aliases) are defined in the field definition where applicable.

attr.attrdef: Field alias: Facility Name. Name of campsite.
Field alias: Facility Type. Type of facility (Camp or Trailhead).
Field alias: Camp Type. Type of campsite (Regular or Multigroup) for those features that are campsites.
Field alias: Number of Camping Pads. Number of camping pads at the campsite.
Field alias: Data Collector. Name of contractor that collected these GPS data.
Field alias: UTM Easting. Easting coordinate (UTM Zone 15 NAD83).
Field alias: UTM Northing. Northing coordinate (UTM Zone 15 NAD83).

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team
